name: HALA!...lan Election Simulator
description:
Try to elect the best president in "HALA!...lan" the election simulation game! Play with up-to-12 friends by loading the game and sharing your screen. Discuss, analyze, and argue with each other over which candidates you should support! 🧐🥺😆

In every game, you will be presented with 4 randomly-generated Presidential Candidates. Sift through the news, the chismis, and social media and cast your support and votes for your preferred candidate :D

Do you have what it takes to elect the best president? 🤔

Created in partnership with DAKILA , Active Vista , and We The Future PH  😀
